Package pt.uc.dei.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.controllers.UserController
@Path("/users") public class UserController extends Object
Handles user registration and management endpoints.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      @POST @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response registerUser(@Valid @Valid TemporaryUserDTO temporaryUserDTO, @HeaderParam("Accept-Language") String language)
      Registers a new user and sends activation email.
      Parameters:
      temporaryUserDTO - Contains email and password for registration
      Returns:
      HTTP response: - 201 (Created) with token if successful - 400 (Bad Request) for invalid data - 409 (Conflict) if email exists - 500 (Error) for server failures

    • getUserData

      @GET @Path("/me") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getUserData(@Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
      Retrieves the authenticated user's data using the JWT cookie.
      Parameters:
      headers - HTTP headers containing cookies.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) with user data, or error response.

    • getUserById

      @GET @Path("/{id}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getUserById(@PathParam("id") long id, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - User ID.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) with user data, or error response.

    • updateUser

      @PATCH @Path("/{id}") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response updateUser(@PathParam("id") Long id, UpdateUserDTO updatedUserDTO)
      Updates a user's information.
      Parameters:
      id - User ID.
      updatedUserDTO - DTO with updated user data.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) if updated, or error response.

    • uploadAvatar

      @PATCH @Path("/{id}/avatar") @Consumes("multipart/form-data") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response uploadAvatar(@PathParam("id") Long id, FileUploadDTO form)
      Uploads or updates a user's avatar.
      Parameters:
      id - User ID.
      form - Multipart form containing the avatar file.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) if uploaded, or error response.

    • getAvatar

      @GET @Path("/{id}/avatar") @Produces({"application/json","image/jpeg","image/png","image/webp"}) public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getAvatar(@PathParam("id") Long id, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.Request request, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
      Retrieves a user's avatar image.
      Parameters:
      id - User ID.
      request - HTTP request context.
      headers - HTTP headers.
      Returns:
      The avatar image or error response.

    • getUsers

      @GET @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getUsers(@QueryParam("id") Long id, @QueryParam("email") String email, @QueryParam("name") String name, @QueryParam("phone") String phone, @QueryParam("accountState") String accountStateStr, @QueryParam("role") String roleStr, @QueryParam("office") String officeStr, @QueryParam("isManager") Boolean userIsManager, @QueryParam("isAdmin") Boolean userIsAdmin, @QueryParam("isManaged") Boolean userIsManaged, @QueryParam("parameter") @DefaultValue("email") String parameterStr, @QueryParam("order") @DefaultValue("ASCENDING") String orderStr, @QueryParam("offset") @DefaultValue("0") int offset, @QueryParam("limit") @DefaultValue("10") int limit, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Retrieves users with optional filters and pagination.
      Parameters:
      id - User ID filter.
      email - Email filter.
      name - Name filter.
      phone - Phone filter.
      accountStateStr - Account state filter.
      roleStr - Role filter.
      officeStr - Office filter.
      parameterStr - Sort parameter.
      orderStr - Sort order.
      offset - Pagination offset.
      limit - Pagination limit.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) with users or message if none found.

    • exportUsersToCSV

      @GET @Path("/export/csv") @Produces("text/csv") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response exportUsersToCSV(@QueryParam("id") Long id, @QueryParam("email") String email, @QueryParam("name") String name, @QueryParam("phone") String phone, @QueryParam("accountState") String accountStateStr, @QueryParam("role") String roleStr, @QueryParam("office") String officeStr, @QueryParam("isManager") Boolean userIsManager, @QueryParam("isAdmin") Boolean userIsAdmin, @QueryParam("isManaged") Boolean userIsManaged, @QueryParam("parameter") @DefaultValue("email") String parameterStr, @QueryParam("order") @DefaultValue("ASCENDING") String orderStr, @QueryParam("language") @DefaultValue("EN") String languageStr, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Exports users as CSV with all filters and sorting (no pagination).
      Parameters:
      id - User ID filter.
      email - Email filter.
      name - Name filter.
      phone - Phone filter.
      accountStateStr - Account state filter.
      roleStr - Role filter.
      officeStr - Office filter.
      parameterStr - Sort parameter.
      orderStr - Sort order.
      jwtToken - JWT authentication token.
      Returns:
      CSV file with all matching users.

    • exportUsersToXLSX

      @GET @Path("/export/xlsx") @Produces("application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response exportUsersToXLSX(@QueryParam("id") Long id, @QueryParam("email") String email, @QueryParam("name") String name, @QueryParam("phone") String phone, @QueryParam("accountState") String accountStateStr, @QueryParam("role") String roleStr, @QueryParam("office") String officeStr, @QueryParam("isManager") Boolean userIsManager, @QueryParam("isAdmin") Boolean userIsAdmin, @QueryParam("isManaged") Boolean userIsManaged, @QueryParam("parameter") @DefaultValue("name") String parameterStr, @QueryParam("order") @DefaultValue("ASCENDING") String orderStr, @QueryParam("language") @DefaultValue("EN") String languageStr, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Exports users as XLSX with all filters and sorting (no pagination).
      Parameters:
      id - User ID filter.
      email - Email filter.
      name - Name filter.
      phone - Phone filter.
      accountStateStr - Account state filter.
      roleStr - Role filter.
      officeStr - Office filter.
      parameterStr - Sort parameter.
      orderStr - Sort order.
      languageStr - Language for header translation.
      jwtToken - JWT authentication token.
      Returns:
      XLSX file with all matching users.

    • addFinishedCourseForUser

      @POST @Path("/{id}/course/{courseId}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response addFinishedCourseForUser(@PathParam("id") Long id, @PathParam("courseId") Long courseId)
      Adds a finished course for a user (manager only).
      Parameters:
      id - User ID
      courseId - Course ID
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 if added, 409 if already completed, 404 if not found, 400 for bad input

    • updateAdminPermissions

      @PUT @Path("/{id}/admin-permissions") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response updateAdminPermissions(@PathParam("id") Long userId, Map<String,Object> requestData, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Updates admin permissions for a user. Only administrators can access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update
      requestData - JSON containing isAdmin boolean
      jwtToken - JWT authentication token
      Returns:
      HTTP response with success/error status
